review:
I met Dr. Divya. L for the first time in 2019 and I am glad I met her for my health issues. From day one she has been the most informative, supportive, empathetic, caring and approachable.
I had two miscarriages. Dr. Divya found out the reason and made all necessary actions and filled confidence in me and finally I delivered my baby boy.I can say my pregnancy journey with her been a blessing!!
Thank you maam for giving support and guidance to make our dream come true.
I highly recommend Dr. Divya maam.

We had a great experience with Mam. She is extremely Good and understanding, rather than prescribing loads of meds, she is more focused on making the patient understand the underlying issue . I would definitely recommend everyone to consult her, without thinking twice.

Hi, I visited Dr Divya mam from my 4th month of pregnancy. I was showing to different doctor in in different place, since I moved to my mom home I was searching for right doctor then I found mam name in practo. really she has very much patience, even if I ask same questions many times, she used to answer same way when she answer first time. in between I had a issue in pregnancy, she treated me very well. she is one of the best doctor have ever met. she suggest every thing in best way. Thank you Mam
